description: Thank you for bringing text adventures to the snap store!! Please put some more up zoon! ;)
summary: It's great to see this on the snap store!

description:
The very first version had ZORK 1, 2 & 3 as one big game. Is that the same here. Later they split it so it could fit on three large 350k floppy disks.

I'll adjust the **** after playing it :-)
good game i pla all time
summary: good game i pla all time

description: The only input is a line, where you type go west, open leaflet, etc. Trust me, it's fun!
summary: Super-old and Super-AWESOME game, it's super funny

description: I have tried to play several times. This crashes at random points in the game. There does not seem to be rhyme or reason to where it crashes.

There isn't a room name shown, so it is very hard to orientate.
The save game can be found at ~/dsave.dat. Copy it if you need multiple ones.
summary: it's zork, but without no room name
